My academic and professional focus lies at the intersection of theoretical computation and practical system implementation, with a specialization in computational graphics and simulation modeling.

In addition to software engineering, I actively serve as a Teaching Assistant and private instructor, guiding students through advanced topics such as algorithm analysis, complex data structures, and system design. I advocate for a constructionist learning methodology; my portfolio evidences this through projects ranging from physics simulators to comprehensive full-stack architectures.
